website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch construction site radio that can be stored just about anywhere.
pros: 2 neodymium speakers for exceptional sound quality
Shock-absorbing frame withstands drops and falls
Equipped with 7-inch antenna for good reception indoors and outdoors
cons: Low volume even at highest volume setting

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A LIE - It is ***NOT a digital radio*** per marketing and reviews
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a digital radio. That is, it does NOT have a digital tuner. Bosch's advertising is VERY deceptive when it says "advanced digital signal processing." A number of positive reviews also include references to this being a "digital" radio. But this is an ANALOG radio, complete with poor reception and lots of static. Bosch should be ASHAMED of themselves. I am returning the radio, and reporting this corporate lie to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: T. Collins Logan

customer_reviews.title: Finicky tuner, good overall sound
customer_reviews.text: I agree with some of the other comments about the tuner. I found it difficult to pull in stations and it required re-tuning from time to time to maintain the sound quality. I bought this radio because of the auxiliary input. I connect my mp3 player to it and I am satisfied with the sound quality. If you already have Bosh power tools and their batteries, or if you want a radio primarily for the auxiliary input, than this radio might make sense. If you don't already have Bosh batteries and are looking for just a shop radio, keep looking. There are better radios available at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: E. LeRoy

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the Bosch PB180, Radio.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the opportunity to take this radio out around the farm when working on different projects away from electrical power source. It has performed wonderfully. Long battery life and good reception on local radio stations. Sound quality is very good for the price. Seems to be built fairly tough to take the rugged knocks that come from working around the farm. Recommend this radio as a good buy for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Martin McGahan

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. Rugged.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use around my home workshop. Good sound. Good reception. Rugged construction. Goes for several hours on a battery. Only ding would be good to have a onboard storage compartment for the AC power adapter and cord.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Sheetz

customer_reviews.title: PROs Good battery life
customer_reviews.text: PROs Good battery life, compact, easy to use CONS Kind of pricey no usb or SD card capability so you are stuck AUX ing your phone or using the radio Sound and volume ok but not great. Maybe slightly above average. A very disappointing substitute for a jobsite radio if that is what you have in mind. I use it when I go fishing. Might have liked it better if I had not been spoiled by the jobsite BOXX. That is one superior tool.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Currier III

customer_reviews.title: Good radio
customer_reviews.text: Works great out here 35miles out to sea on Nantucket. Even gets some of the hard stations out of Boston and providence
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hight

customer_reviews.title: great product, cheap power cord
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of the radio and the sound. I do remodeling in apts and it is a perfect size. The mute button is in a handy place when I have to silence it. 6 presets make it easy to find my favorites. The only complaint I have is the power cord. the wires broke where it enters the plug after one month. I bought a zippered utility bag to keep it in so it would stay nice. That part doesn't seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ray C. Stuteville

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker for the money i wish the rechargeable battery wasnt so expensive but plugged in to the wall it works just fine and is alot louder than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome radio
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, great reception. Lasts all day on one battery. Perfect size for the jobsite.
customer_reviews.author: cainfam

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Radio
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality and the controls are easy to figure out. This radio is the perfect size for garage / shop use
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Radio has a good sound, however did not realize the unit does ...
customer_reviews.text: Radio has a good sound, however did not realize the unit does not come with a battery(sold separately) and does not come with a charger(sold separately. Your total amount will change.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Colbrook

customer_reviews.title: great for camping
customer_reviews.text: Works and sounds great. Im able to get about 6 hours out of a 1.3 amp battery at a moderate level. On my 4.0 amp battery around 12. Great size for camping and canoeing. The whole.reason i purchased was so i could fit.it.in my dry bag . Very satisfied. Only downside is the extrernal 110v power supply. Its bulky and no where to store it. I only use the batteries so this really doesnt bother me but for jobsites with power it could be a pain to not lose it or break the flimsy wire
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need. I just wanted to have a box that could provided AM/FM and play my IPod while working in my shop. This item does it all. The sound output and quality is very good for such a small device. Does not take up much room and is quite light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Gunners

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice radio picks up channels good small and light weight for easy job site transportation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is super powerful and picks up many stations
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my retiring hubby for his garage! It is super powerful and picks up many stations ... Clear reception and he LOVES it!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty C

customer_reviews.title: Cord sucks
customer_reviews.text: Great radio. But the transformer cord really suck it broke after couple weeks had to solder the cord back together. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Buss

customer_reviews.title: High quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was better than I expected. Love this product. Too bad it has been discontinued. I got one of the last ones.
customer_reviews.author: Khemraj Ramjit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table top portable radio. Clear crisp sound' well thought out design. Highly recommened.
customer_reviews.author: proto::

customer_reviews.title: What kind battery pack goes to radio
customer_reviews.text: Love radio but did not come with battery pack in back so now not sure what kind to buy
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This little radio can make some noise, or my favorite pastime, working on a car while listening to a SEC football game. It is one of the best buys I have made in a while.
customer_reviews.author: preacher_man_d

customer_reviews.title: First one went swimming.  Oops.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my friends old one. We thought we could save it but, we were too late. It did float for a minute though and even seemed like it was going to keep working. They don't swim well though. Alas, it is a great work, camp, fish radio. 2ah battery will last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: This radio works well. It is smaller than I expected. I should have checked the dimensions before I bought. My Ipod plays well through the AUX input.
customer_reviews.author: THEE MANN

customer_reviews.title: Best shop radio!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit to being a Bosch fan and this only re-enforced that. What a great package!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great for a little package
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good for a little job site radio. Looks like I will have to purchase a battery and charger some time in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Perry G.

customer_reviews.title: Love Bosch products !
customer_reviews.text: Love this radio, but feel I got a lemon. It shuts off on battery or plugged in. Item powers off when using Auxiliary in. It cycles off and you have to turn back on. I really like this radio but feel something is wrong with mine in that it won't stay on longer than 15 minutes. Radio use is fine. Do I have a short or program issue ? 3/31/2017 I received my replacement and it works just fine. I guess I did have a weird issue with the first one. Not sure why. Thank you Amazon and Bosch for responding to my issue. Bumped my review up to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MikeF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set stations in memory
customer_reviews.text: Very portable! Easy to set stations in memory! Great to carry around to keep us company while we work! Doesn't take battery very long to re-charge. You do need a charger for the battery, which we already had, plus already had a 2nd battery that fit.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio
customer_reviews.text: Great radio. I especially like the preset station buttons on the top.
customer_reviews.author: E. S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just what he wanted and is enjoyng it very much
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: nice sound and is exactly perfect for our
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present and he loves it!! that in itself is huge, nice sound and is exactly perfect for our application
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Rugged good quality  clear sound
customer_reviews.text: I have used this radio on maybe as many as 50 job sites and sometimes even carry it around my three story house when I am listening to a program and need to do something on a different floor.. It is really easy to move around carry with one finger and yet has a big clear sound. Well built easy to change the battery. The buttons are also easy to get to and I have dropped it a few times without any real damage. If it ever got lost or broke I would want another one or as close as I could get to it as fast as I would want to replace a broken drill.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound / great product. Just wish the battery came with the radio.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Linder

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works nice, has a good sound for a small radio. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Wilhite

customer_reviews.title: Radio works great but I had to buy a battery and charger ...
customer_reviews.text: Radio works great but I had to buy a battery and charger which cost more than the radio the description should say battery and charger not included
customer_reviews.author: bruce thieman

customer_reviews.title: Reception isn't to bad either.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the sound of such a small radio. Reception isn't to bad either.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: well built and as described
customer_reviews.text: I really like this radio and it fits what I was looking for, just a radio for the back porch that sounded half way decent and was well built. No problems with reception, gets all the local stations and has plenty of clear sound for easy listening. The only thing keeping this from being a 5 star is posted in other reviews and I new before purchasing, it would be nice if they had done a regular power chord for the 110 power.
customer_reviews.author: paul baeckel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality radio needs better battery for playing
customer_reviews.text: Plays good. The battery doesn't last as long as I thought it would. I get around 4 hours of play time before battery dies and batteries for this are not cheap. Great product but make a better battery for that price or make the battery affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetpea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i absolutely love the radio. puts out great sound n is compact. shipping was accurate and fast
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Czaplicke

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: A great sound out a smaller frame. I had the larger Bosch before this one. The only con would be that it does not charge battery packs.
customer_reviews.author: Reflex808

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice- would be better if you could charge the battery while it is in the radio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works great. I've had mine for 3 months now. only thing you might need is a longer aux. cord. one they give you is only 3inches long
customer_reviews.author: aarron t. austin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Small and underpowered. Could hardly hear it with volume maxed at work.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Battery last about 8 hrs and can hear it over ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery last about 8 hrs and can hear it over the engine of the work truck I drive which is loud.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Owen

customer_reviews.title: The Bosch PB180 is a Great Little Portable Radio
customer_reviews.text: The Bosch PB180 is the better (longer run time) of it's two small radios (18 V vs 12 V); both size 18 V, batteries (1.5 Ah & 4.0 Ah) fit flush with the back of radio. The radio comes with a 115 Volt power supply for playing the radio (but not charge the battery), and there's a place for two AAA cells which maintains time & five station programming settings.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lance

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my husband is really enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: Gail Bell

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: It's very small first off. It is nice and sounds great but this is no job site radio. It would probly work great in a shop or garage where it never gets moved but handle this thing too much and it's done. It didn't make it 2 days on the job site. It's just not tough enough to handle a work environment.
customer_reviews.author: leelasmom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great a must have for anyone working around the house
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I left this running from 8am to almost 10pm and ...
customer_reviews.text: I left this running from 8am to almost 10pm and it was still going strong. The radio does have a slight problem with interference in a building sometimes. I was able to get past it by adjusting the antenna or moving the radio entirely. I can't wait to take it on vacation!!
customer_reviews.author: baby bear

customer_reviews.title: A nice radio.
customer_reviews.text: A nice radio.....however, I was a little disappointed to find it doesn't come with an 18V battery to operate the radio where AC power is not available.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for work, and it gets reception. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dorn

customer_reviews.title: Great little boom box
customer_reviews.text: Great sound system for taking around my yard and indoor jobs. Handy that it uses the same battery as my drill. My son can hook his ipod to it so he can hear his favorite music when we work on his car, boom box style.
customer_reviews.author: GlennC

customer_reviews.title: Nice, compact radio/aux player
customer_reviews.text: Nice, compact radio/aux player. Blows through a charged battery rather quickly though. A built in charger on the rear would make this an awesome unit. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: rockcutter

customer_reviews.title: Surprising sound
customer_reviews.text: I don't always want I tote around a big job site radio to every job, so I purchased the little Bosch radio , and was surprised by how good the sound quality is , for such a small radio. Works great for a small radio , I use it a lot more than I thought I would
customer_reviews.author: Viking construction

customer_reviews.title: good little job radio
customer_reviews.text: Great little radio I have a bosch job box which is very heavy this is little smaller then I had thought which is not a bad thing
customer_reviews.author: red011565

customer_reviews.title: I left my old one outside and the rain destroyed ...
customer_reviews.text: I left my old one outside and the rain destroyed it, I bought this to replace it so I had the charger and batteries, buying new they should include a battery!
customer_reviews.author: Tom D

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. I have only had it for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. I have only had it for a few days and I already dropped it about 15 feet and it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Casella

customer_reviews.title: -Loud great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: -Loud great sound quality, and rugged. -Doesn't charge battery which sucks but it's small and portable. -Full 18v lithion slim pack last about 6 Hrs -Highly recommend over the hug 18v radio Bosch makes
customer_reviews.author: Brian silva

customer_reviews.title: TOM loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son, the pool contractor, thinks it is the best thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.author: Chief Quazi Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality , good price , I like it because it small .
customer_reviews.author: Toolman

customer_reviews.title: I'm sutre the price was half too so I'm pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Radio turned out to be about half the size i expected after seeing and hearing my cousins work radio. I'm sutre the price was half too so I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Plante

customer_reviews.title: Nice radio, great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Nice radio, great sound. Wish it had a CD player; would be great. Love that it doesn't need a cord to operate. I am concerned it doesn't seem real tough, especially the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Rogerson

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded all expectations - rugged case; simple controls and full stero sound. Would recommend to all who love music. I brought a second one for a gift - a well received gift!
customer_reviews.author: William T Nunn

customer_reviews.title: Garage radio
customer_reviews.text: Radio is fine. Aux function could be better if the cable be longer. Jack tempts to get out of the hole when gets twisted. And with original cable you have to twist it all the time. Sound quality is so-so. Clock on it is a plus. One battery power lasts for a half a day or more when on max volume. I personally have no use for a power cord, but it does look somewhat fragile for a construction site. So after all its more of a garage or backyard radio.
customer_reviews.author: Berez

customer_reviews.title: Very dependable little radio
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job, I use it in a warehouse in the cool to cold sections and it keeps on going. I would recommend this just because it is not a energy monster and has very clear and loud enough sound system. I would definitely buy this item again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Macias

customer_reviews.title: Jammin tunes
customer_reviews.text: This Boom Box Rocks! It just won't charge the battery, but if you have the drill it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Lance_ekvall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great refurbished unit at a fair price. Wish it would had come with a battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back as not what my son wanted. Needed something with louder speakers.
customer_reviews.author: sall

customer_reviews.title: What no battery
customer_reviews.text: Good AM/FM basic radio Does not come with the real battery. Just the small AA's for the clock. If you want to use this on Battery Power you need to buy the Bosch 18V Li+ battery pack 619 4AH for $70 or the 609 1.3 AH for $35 so factor that into your cost if you don't own Bosch tools. Adding the cost of wither to this unit makes it less desirable for those who need the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: J. Busse

customer_reviews.title: Great pick! Wonderful  sounding ,
customer_reviews.text: Compact, but yet Great! Comes in great ! Order a battery with it !
customer_reviews.author: Jody Jimmo

product_meta.title: Bosch 18-Volt or 120V Compact AM/FM Radio with MP3 Player Connection Bay PB180
product_meta.description:
The 18-Volt Compact Radio offers the lightest weight, most compact 18-Volt radio on the market. The 5-Watt neodymium speakers provide great sound in the same durable package that the pros have come to expect from Bosch products. It even stores conveniently within an L-BOXX-2. High strength shock-absorbing housing and handles provide maximum robustness and protection.

AMAZON.COM


BOSCH PB180 18V COMPACT RADIO
Bosch’s PB180 18V Compact Radio is the ultimate jobsite radio that provides a powerful sound in a compact size. High performance neodymium speakers give the PB180 maximum sound quality and clarity. As an added option, integrated screw mount slots on the back of the radio allow it to be mounted to the wall. It has AC/DC power compatibility and is powered by a Bosch AC Adapter or Bosch 18V Li-Ion batteries.

view larger COMPACT SIZE & HIGH PERFORMANCE
Bosch’s PB180 comes in a compact size that can be conveniently stored anywhere. It even fits into a half L-BOXX-2 and is the only radio on the market with that capability. At only 4.1 lbs, it is one of the lightest jobsite radios available. Additionally, the backlit display feature with fuel gauge increases visibility and shows how much battery power is left. The PB180 has superior performance with two days of run time using a 4.0Ah battery.

HIGH PERFORMANCE NEODYMIUM SPEAKERS & EXTERNAL AUX PORT
Its two 5-Watt speakers project maximum sound clarity and quality over loud jobsite conditions. An external AUX port allows connectivity to external digital media players.

HIGH STRENGTH SHOCK-ABSORBING HOUSING & HANDLES
The PB180 has high strength shock-absorbing housing and handles that provide maximum robustness and protection. It is extremely durable and can be fully functional after a two meter drop. Additionally, a rugged 7” antenna pivots and rotates 360 degrees for maximum reception outside or inside buildings.

ADVANCED DIGITAL SIGNAL PROCESSING & 10 PRESET AM/FM STATIONS
The advanced digital signal processing optimizes AM/FM reception quality while the 10 preset AM/FM stations allow you to preset all your favorites.

AC/DC POWER COMPATIBILITY
The PB180 18-volt compact radio is powered by the Bosch AC adapter (included) or Bosch 18-volt Lithium-Ion batteries and chargers (not included, sold separately).

view larger WHAT'S IN THE BOX 
Bosch PB180 compact radio.


AT A GLANCE:
 * 18-volt compact radio weighing 4.1 lbs
 * Two 5-Watt high performance neodymium speakers
 * Two days of run time when using a 4.0Ah battery
 * External AUX port allowing connectivity to digital media players
 * High strength shock-absorbing housing and handles
 * 10 preset AM/FM stations
 * AC/DC power compatibility
feature_bullets: COMPACT: Weighing only 4 lbs. and measuring 12 inches long, the Bosch PB180 18V compact radio can be stored anywhere, including the Bosch L-Boxx system

SOUND: The PB180 radio features two high performance, 5-Watt neodymium speakers for maximum sound clarity and quality over jobsite noise. The PB180 comes complete with an external auxiliary port to connect to digital media players
DURABILITY: The jobsite radio has high strength shock-absorbing housing and handles that provide maximum robustness and protection. Even at a 2 meter drop, the PB180 can be fully functional

QUALITY: Featuring advanced digital signal processing to optimize AM/FM reception quality with 10 preset options for all your favorite stations. The PB180 also includes a 7” antenna that pivots and rotates 360 degrees for maximum reception both indoors and outdoors
COMPATIBILITY The PB180 is powered by the Bosch AC adapter (included) or Bosch 18V Lithium-Ion batteries and chargers (not included, sold separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars189 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
